WorkItem.ClosedComment: Believe this got addressed in the most recent spec update
WorkItem.Description:
In the grammar for ambient declarations, you have:

AmbientDeclaration: 
     declare AmbientVariableDeclaration

However, AmbientVariableDeclaration is equivalent to VariableDeclaration and only allows one variable declarator. It should really be AmbientVariableDeclarationList (and so on) since it should allow multiple declarators, and this is (in fact) what the compiler accepts.
WorkItem.Summary: AmbientDeclaration rule in spec grammar is incomplete

Comments.Message: Good catch. We'll update the spec.
